title: BeatX
subtitle: BeatX is a modern full-stack music streaming app with personalized playlists, song liking, and seamless playback—crafted for an immersive audio experience.

features.title: Authentication
features.description: Secure login and signup with JWT-based authentication, including protected routes and user session validation for enhanced privacy.

features.title: Liked Songs
features.description: Users can easily like or unlike songs and access their personalized favorites across all devices for a consistent music journey.

features.title: Custom Playlists
features.description: Create, manage, and enjoy personal playlists with a user-friendly interface designed to simplify your music organization process.

features.title: Music Playback
features.description: Experience seamless playback with support for individual tracks and full playlists, including intuitive next and previous controls.

features.title: Powerful Search
features.description: Quickly find songs with responsive real-time search, intelligently paired with recently searched history for smart suggestions.

features.title: Dynamic Home Feed
features.description: Your home feed adapts dynamically with trending albums, artist playlists, and your activity to offer a personalized experience.

features.title: User-Centric UX
features.description: Intuitive design that guides users with subtle prompts like login requests before playback, ensuring smooth and secure access.

features.title: Full Stack Integration
features.description: Clean architecture with a fully decoupled frontend and backend stack for reliable performance and easier maintenance at scale.

title: Youtellect
subtitle: Youtellect is a smart YouTube summarizer app that leverages LLMs to deliver crisp summaries, timelines, and notes—turning long videos into digestible insights.

features.title: LLM-Powered Summaries
features.description: Uses Meta's open-source LLM to generate detailed summaries and smart breakdowns of YouTube videos, saving users time and effort.

features.title: Timestamped Timelines
features.description: Extracts key moments and topics with timestamps to help users navigate through videos more efficiently and focus on what matters.

features.title: Study-Ready Notes
features.description: Generates well-structured, exam-style notes perfect for revision, learning, or reviewing technical and educational content.

features.title: Video Info + Transcript
features.description: Fetches video metadata and full transcript to support precise and meaningful processing before applying LLM summarization.

features.title: Full Stack Architecture
features.description: Built on a decoupled MERN + Python architecture to support scalable and AI-powered performance.

title: Narayan News
subtitle: Narayan News is a fast, category-based news platform built with React. It leverages a third-party News API to deliver real-time headlines across business, tech, sports, and more—all in a clean, responsive interface.

features.title: Live News by Category
features.description: Fetches and displays real-time news across various categories such as business, technology, sports, and entertainment using a public News API.

features.title: Responsive Design
features.description: Optimized for both desktop and mobile viewing, providing a seamless reading experience across all screen sizes.

features.title: Real-Time Updates
features.description: Ensures users get the latest headlines by pulling fresh data dynamically from the API on each category click.

title: Software Developer Intern - fourkites
subtitle: Contributed as a Full Stack Intern at FourKites, building enterprise-grade features across Angular, React, Spring Boot, and Ruby. Enhanced observability and debugging automation through LLM-based tools.

features.title: Enterprise Module Revamp
features.description: Redesigned logistics modules handling 15M+ records, streamlining workflows and reducing support tickets by 30%.

features.title: LLM-Powered RCA Automation
features.description: Used Azure OpenAI and Python to parse Signoz logs, automating root cause analysis and reducing manual debugging effort.

features.title: Manual RCA & Ticket Debugging
features.description: Resolved real-time production issues and support tickets with quick turnaround by performing manual root cause analysis and code-level debugging.

features.title: Role-Based Access & Security
features.description: Built secure role-based UIs and backend validations, ensuring fine-grained access control across the platform.

features.title: Cross-Stack Collaboration
features.description: Worked across teams using modern CI/CD, RESTful APIs, and Agile workflows to deliver robust full-stack features on time.

title: Intervia
subtitle: Intervia is a real-world mock interview platform connecting students with professionals. It features role-based access, profile building, interview scheduling, feedback sharing, and Kafka-based event streaming.

features.title: Role-Based Access
features.description: Supports distinct roles for students and professionals, offering tailored access and functionality across the platform.

features.title: Profile Management
features.description: Students and professionals can create detailed profiles with resumes, skills, and projects for better visibility.

features.title: Interview Scheduling
features.description: Students can book slots, and professionals can manage availability with real-time conflict checks and validations.

features.title: Feedback & Acceptance
features.description: Professionals can accept/decline interviews and provide structured feedback to students after the session.

features.title: Kafka-Based Messaging
features.description: Real-time events like interview booking and feedback sharing are handled through Kafka producers and consumers.

features.title: Secure JWT Authentication
features.description: Ensures secure access and protected endpoints with Spring Security and JWT-based authentication.
